thread.title: Latino Donald Trump supporter says more Mexicans means a taco truck on every corner
thread.title_full: Latino Donald Trump supporter says more Mexicans means a taco truck on every corner | Mic

author: mic.com
title: Latino Donald Trump supporter says more Mexicans means a taco truck on every corner
text:
Pass the Tapatio, because this Donald Trump supporter has a proposition for you!
While on All in With Chris Hayes on Thursday evening, Latinos for Trump founder Marco Gutierrez warned of the danger of allowing Mexican culture to enter the United States unabated.
Latinos for Trump founder @MarcoGutierrez: "you're gonna have taco trucks on every corner" #innershttp://nbcnews.to/2c5lUQr
"My culture is a very dominant culture, and it's imposing and it's causing problems," Gutierrez said. "If you don't do something about it, you're going to have taco trucks on every corner."
Gutierrez's comments came during a discussion of Trump's proposal to deport millions of immigrants, which he iterated during a speech in Arizona on Wednesday. Trump's anti-immigration speech came after he made a joint appearance with Mexican president Enrique Peña Nieto earlier in the day, with Nieto later iterating he would not pay for Trump's proposed wall on the United States' southern border.
Source: Damian Dovarganes/AP A fter Gutierrez described the culinary wonderland that the United States could become if Trump loses the presidency — a nation that resembles an all-you-can-eat taco buffet — Twitter lit up in response to his comments.
Glad to see #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner is still trending this morning. We must stand against this anti-taco rhetoric. #ImWithTacos
Twitter is still waiting for @salmahayek to weigh in on #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner.pic.twitter.com/XU18xTBDoK
Joe is drafting a bill as we speak. He got no sleep last night. #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner
TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner RT @Goatyeah: Me, walking to the taco truck erry day #TacoTrucksOnEveryCornerpic.twitter.com/h1XD7In2a6
Arriving to the #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner partypic.twitter.com/rD6pY2WN4E
I deadass want #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner . That sounds bomb af tbh.
TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner is trending worldwide & it's turning me on slightly. Can we get elotes, tostilocos & frutas on every corner, too?
Can someone remind me why #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner is a bad thing again? ¯\_(?)_/¯
When it hits you that #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner is actually your dream come true.pic.twitter.com/EJebfY6LYo
I vote we deport the people who don't like tacos. I'm deeply offended by that. #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner
I will vote for whoever promises #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner
You know that food we ALL love? If we don't stop things...there will be MORE of it available in EVERY corner! #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner
We're gonna have to build a Northern wall to keep the Canadians out of our tacos. #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner
"Why when I was your age, I had to walk *two* blocks, in the snow, just to get some damn tortillas and guac!" #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner
Here for #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner like...pic.twitter.com/rmyBnsEuna
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CrUVtpTUAAApTVQ.jpg:large To be honest Im not a fan of #TacoTrucksOnEveryCorner Id prefer Pico de gallo or Pollo a La Parrilla trucks on every corner
If there are going to be taco trucks on every corner, at least Americans know someone who always carries hot sauce with her .
Hillary Clinton keeps hot sauce in her bag, swag. Source: Giphy
